workflow:
apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Workflow
metadata:
  generateName: outfit-selection-workflow-
spec:
  entrypoint: main
  templates:
  - name: main
    dag:
      tasks:
      - name: getweather
        template: getweather
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: city
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.city }}}}'
      - name: selectoutfit
        template: selectoutfit
        dependencies:
        - getweather
        arguments:
          parameters:
          - name: weather
            value: '{{{{ tasks.getweather.result }}}}'
          - name: occasion
            value: '{{{{ inputs.parameters.occasion }}}}'
  - name: getweather
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: city
    container:
      image: appropriate-image-for-getweather-api
      command: [sh, -c]
      args: ["get-weather {{inputs.parameters.city}}"]
  - name: selectoutfit
    inputs:
      parameters:
      - name: weather
      - name: occasion
    container:
      image: appropriate-image-for-selectoutfit-api
      command: [sh, -c]
      args: ["select-outfit --weather={{inputs.parameters.weather}} --occasion={{inputs.parameters.occasion}}"]
